messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

error when submitting urgent original message sent july re error when submitting urgent hi sent but ticket kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer managed mobile sent july re error when submitting urgent did you get logged ticket with planning officer infrastructure upcoming holiday none please consider environment you really need print sent july re error when submitting urgent hi there any update unable submit for rd july th july get same error for weeks kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent july re error when submitting urgent hi able save changes but when submitting get following error kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent july error when submitting urgent please below kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent july re one drive cr hi could you help kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent july re one drive cr hi should be working technical programme manager planned holiday th return monday th sent july re one drive cr hi still can add kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent july re one drive cr thanks kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent july re one drive cr added retain we can discuss details with when back technical programme manager planned holiday th return monday th sent july re one drive cr hi there should be unused days remaining retain updated five days implement change phase remaining users days for any additional work mon rd july th july be fine kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent july re one drive cr last one can you please let know days each week you need complete work including past starting st july until you think you be finished then two things enter retain update confirm with when back about total cost for technical programme manager planned holiday th return monday th sent july re one drive cr hi was split into two phases by phase test groups phase remaining users work included creating guide guide sessions requested by kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent july re one drive cr was what you doing july there booking retain getting some lunch but be easier have call little later unless you can send help thanks technical programme manager planned holiday th return monday th sent july one drive cr hi kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent re one drive cr shall sent re one drive cr hi could you please move unused days forward retain can book for week kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent re one drive cr mate can you changes for test friday cheers sent re one drive cr change with cab kind regards senior server infrastructure engineer sent one drive cr importance high hi noticed peer review task closed good there but can kindly ask why cr draft would mean reached yesterday cab would lead delay kind regards infrastructure manager mob ext en address street center
